featured.text: This probably explains why during the COVID-19 pandemic, horror and pandemic thrillers were the most-watched movies on digital movie apps.
Some were even set up to allow people to call their loved ones lost in the COVID-19 pandemic.

definition.zh_def: 全球性流行病，通常指影響廣泛且持續時間長的傳染病。
definition.en_def: A global outbreak of a disease that occurs when a new pathogen spreads easily from person to person across multiple countries or continents.
definition.example: The pandemic caused many countries to implement strict health measures to control the spread of the virus.
